description: See and change all keybindings
Use Ctrl + D if you want to add the occurrences of the current selection one by one. Each time you press the key combination it adds a new occurrence to the selection.
Gives your code more space
Add additional cursors to edit all occurrences of the current selection.
Shows suggestions to quickly fill properties and other stuff.
Increases scroll speed with 5x
Search and open any file
Run any command
Allows you to jump around in the file, for example to a function or css class or html tag.
Block all distractions and focus
Format the document
Copies the entire row
Allows you to jump directly to a line number, e.g. row 1167
Searches all files in the project.
Searches and replaces in all files in the project.
Search in the current file
Searches and Replaces in the current file
Removes all trailing whitespaces for the current line
Comments the current line, remove with `Ctrl+K Ctrl+U`
Uncomments the current line. Reverse with `Ctrl+K Ctrl+C`
